question: What is the theme of the online Contact Group Summit of Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) held in May 2020?
option3: Stakeholders for a Cohesive and Sustainable World
explanation:
The online Contact Group Summit of Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) 2020 was recently held, to discuss the response to the prevalent COVID-19 crisis.
Prime Minister Narendra Modi participated in the online Summit, which was hosted by the current Chairman of NAM, President of Republic of Azerbaijan. The theme of the Contact Group Summit was "United against COVID-19‚Äù. The event also commemorated the International Day of Multilateralism and Diplomacy for Peace.
